1370: Herardus moved to Die Coninc straet.E.1 after marriage.
Got married to Emmelina at age 19 in 1370.
1373: Had a son with Emmelina, Herardus, at age 22.
1374: Lost son Herardus when Herardus was 2 years old.
1375: Had a son with Emmelina, Heideric, at age 24.
1377: Had a daughter with Emmelina, Katerina, at age 26.
1379: Had a son with Emmelina, Iacobus, at age 28.
1381: Had a son with Emmelina, Stephanus, at age 30.
1384: Had a daughter with Emmelina, Flore, at age 33.
1386: Had a daughter with Emmelina, Sipper, at age 35.
1387: Lost son Stephanus when Stephanus was 7 years old.
